thread.title: Soldier Returns To Wife Waiting With Huge Surprise
thread.title_full: Soldier Returns To Wife Waiting With Huge Surprise

author: faithTap.com
title: Soldier Returns To Wife Waiting With Huge Surprise
text:
Soldier Comes Home To Son, Then Realizes His Wife Has Been Keeping A Huge Secret Heather Kelly 2/10/2017 After Alan left overseas for a month, Tiffany wondered how she was going to be able to keep the secret. Experiencing a miracle and not saying a word about it is nothing easy - and it truly felt like a miracle when Tiffany found out she was pregnant. For the past two years, both Alan and Tiffany have struggled over the miscarriage they suffered after they had their first son, Aiden. Since the miscarriage, they have remained hopeful that they would be able to have another baby. They no idea it would ever come at a time like this...
In the video, watch as Tiffany and Aiden anxiously wait for Alan to appear after returning home. If the reunion alone wasn't even to put a grin on your face, wait until Tiffany encourages him to take a glance at little Aiden's shirt. That's when Alan looked down and saw it. Printed on a t-shirt was the revealing of the biggest surprise Alan could have imagined. And as Alan immediately looked into Tiffany's eyes in disbelief, it was nothing short of special.
Both Alan and Tiffany savored the moment in their own special way, while little Aiden couldn't help but laugh from his happiness. He knew that not only was he going to be a big brother, but that his daddy was finally back at home. Seeing the joy of a reunion combined with the joy of a new father just might make you shed a tear! Watch the full scene in the video below! "Like" Our Page :)
